H1.text: Who wrote Of Mice and Men. F. Scott Fitzgerald

H2.text: Who wrote Of Mice and Men. William Faulkner

H3.text: Who wrote Of Mice and Men. Steinbeck

A4.text: Of Mice and Men is a 1937 tragic novel that Steinbeck rewrote as a play that same year.
